response.original_title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Equal Pay - The Brewster Women
response.overview: Three generations of women talk about working in and out of the home. The grandmother was expected to stay at home and raise children. The mother succeeded as a single parent who assumed she had the right to equal pay. The daughter found that women have to work twice as hard to prove that they are just as capable as men.
response.tagline: Three generations of women working in and out of the home.
response.title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Equal Pay - The Brewster Women
